trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the header of each column that has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: Quando a classificação está ativada, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controles são processados no cabeçalho de cada coluna que tenha o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> conjunto de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: (For automatically generated columns, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property contains the same value as the data field.) These links allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: (Para colunas geradas automaticamente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> propriedade contém o mesmo valor que o campo de dados.) Esses links permitem que você classifique o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle pela coluna selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event to sort a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como especificar e codificar um manipulador para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> evento para classificar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> é criado por uma chamada para o construtor, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: The value of the `commandSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `commandSource` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `dce.CommandArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `dce.CommandArgument` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte do comando.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to get the command source that raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> para alterar a fonte de comando que gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> evento.

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised only when a link is clicked in the header of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, the returned source is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the header.
trans-unit.target: Porque esse evento é gerado somente quando você clica no cabeçalho de um link de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle, a fonte retornada é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objeto que representa o cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to programmatically control the header.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para controlar programaticamente o cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to programmatically control the header in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> propriedade para controlar programaticamente o cabeçalho de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the expression used to sort the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a expressão usada para classificar o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The expression used to sort the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A expressão usada para classificar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> property to determine which column the user selected to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> propriedade para determinar qual coluna o usuário selecionado para classificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> property to determine which column the user selected to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> propriedade para determinar qual coluna o usuário selecionado para classificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> controlar.
